name: Turrrrrret
description:
For whatever reason you have to defend your two cores from incoming blue dots!

Defend it by placing towers and managing the direction they are facing! You get upgrades for your towers on rounds 1, 3, 6 and 9 (currently).

You can turn the towers by clicking and dragging or by dragging their handles.

Controls:

[1], [2] to build towers.

[I] to open your upgrade inventory after the waves

Click the little play button after the wave to start the next. If you use it during the wave, you turn on bullet time to help you organise if you get overwhelmed.
